column1:
Kuurk9999,"2017-02-27T16:24:35.653Z","Careful Hero, Lightning CAN strike Twice!!!!!","

Voltix is an interesting Villain in the Hero Factory lineup, so, I will do a summed up review of him here. Pros and Cons will be summed up in the review here and there.

• He has a messy color scheme as he has the many colors of purple, titanium metallic, red, and some bits of blue and yellow to him, but it makes sense because in actuality, Lightning has tints of purple to it just as much as it has yellow, red, and blue.
<li>The arms and pipes are placed in a mess.&nbsp
